Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>……聖獣の力を得たからと言って 本当に純粋な身体がもらえるとは限らないぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>, even if you get the power of a Sacred Beast, that doesn't mean you'll get a pure body.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、あのゲオルギアスを封じ込めた 力だもの……それくらいは……
Entry.EnglishText: But it was a power capable of containing Geyorkias... Surely it would be enough to...

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当にそんな風に自分の身体を 変えてしまってもいいのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you really think it would be a good thing to change your body like that?

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえがそうやって生まれた意味を、 考えてみるのも悪くないと思うがな……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't think it would be a bad idea to at least consider the reason why you were born.
Entry.Notes: I think this translation needs double checked. I feel that she is talking about the "way" you where born not "why"?
